name: Snake Game (MerrickPog)
description: This is a snake game made in the command prompt, the controls are pretty simple. You open to a menu and hit N for a new game then pick the speed of the snake and game which is 1-6, 1 being the slowest, and 6 being the fastest. Then you play the game with WASD and try to eat the apples to grow as long as possible without bumping into the walls.
